H0.text: Biology is the official name for the study of life.

H1.text: Chemistry is the official name for the study of life.

H2.text: Geology is the official name for the study of life.

H3.text: Botany is the official name for the study of life.

A4.text: Biology is the scientific study of life and living organisms.

A5.text: Biochemistry is the study of chemical processes within and relating to living organisms.
